title: Whale Watching in Mirissa
short: Witness majestic blue whales along Sri Lanka's southern coast.
description: Mirissa is one of the best places in the world to witness blue whales. This guided experience offers a safe and unforgettable journey into the Indian Ocean.

title: Ella Rock Sunrise Hike
short: A scenic hike through tea plantations and misty hills.
description: Climb to Ella Rock at dawn for a panoramic sunrise. The trail winds through tea plantations and forested paths, rewarding you with sweeping valley views.

title: Sigiriya Ancient Fortress Tour
short: Explore Sri Lanka's most iconic UNESCO World Heritage Site.
description: Walk through the ancient gardens and climb the rock fortress with a guide who brings Sigiriya's history to life.

title: Yala Wildlife Safari
short: Spot leopards, elephants, and birdlife in Yala National Park.
description: Ride through Yala's most scenic tracks with an experienced tracker and learn about Sri Lanka's wildlife.

title: Galle Fort Heritage Walk
short: Explore the colonial streets, caf√©s, and sea walls of Galle Fort.
description: Discover Dutch-era architecture and hidden courtyards with a local guide who shares the stories behind the fort.

title: Horton Plains & World's End Trek
short: A highland trek to World's End and Baker's Falls.
description: Start early to catch misty landscapes and wide-open views in Sri Lanka's most iconic highland park.

title: Arugam Bay Surf Session
short: Learn to surf or level up on Sri Lanka's east coast.
description: Join a surf coach in Arugam Bay and ride consistent waves in a laid-back beach town.

title: Nuwara Eliya Tea Estate Tour
short: Visit a tea factory and stroll through rolling plantations.
description: Learn how Ceylon tea is made and enjoy a guided walk through scenic estates.

title: Unawatuna Snorkeling Escape
short: Swim in clear waters and spot colorful reef fish.
description: A relaxed snorkeling session in Unawatuna with calm waters and a protected bay.

title: Scenic Train Ride to Ella
short: Ride one of the most scenic train routes in the world.
description: Travel through misty mountains, tea estates, and iconic bridges on the way to Ella.
